name: Aftermath (itch) (dlevy)
description:
In the wake of a catastrophic earthquake, you must navigate the ruins of your apartment building in order to find your sibling and ensure their safety. As your resources diminish, you must rely on sound to make your way through the darkness. When different people cross your path during your search, you must decide whether or not to use your resources to assist them, or to continue your search for your sibling. This game is procedurally generated, offering a different playthrough every time. Play this game and discover how community rises in the face of disaster.

Developed by Alex Cabral, David Levy, David Sherbinin, Mal Strout
